Name: Lumber King
About the game: Once, you were a good and nice boy, like sunshine. Till that day, the misfortune befell you. Your favourite toy car crashed into that tree, at the gate of the park. The lost precious tought you to hate. You hate all trees in the world. So here you are, the legendary Lumber King. Click to cut off all the trees; Lead your heroes and let them cut off all the trees; Collect roots, levelup your heroes, cut off more trees; Collect Wood Souls, levelup your skills, cut off more trees; Use you power to evolve your hero, make them stronger, cut off more trees; Finally, this world will be a desert; You really hate green.
